Description:
"It was not one or two or three emails... it was tens or 20." In this clip, Log4j maintainer Christian Grobmeier shares the untold story of the exact moment he discovered the Log4Shell vulnerability, turning a quiet family evening into the start of a global crisis.

#Log4j #Log4shell #Cybersecurity

Author: GitHub
Title: "A bomb dropping in my inbox": the discovery of Log4Shell
